subtitleNullable: Business news articles on 8 different topics, collected from 2 newswire websites
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I collected these business news articles when I started off with NLP.
I assume this data is well structured to be used by anyone who is looking to do a little learning on document classification. 


### Content

The documents in this dataset is from 2 different sources and 8 categories namely:
1. Product / fdaApproval
2. Contract
3. Dividend
4. ManagementChanges
5. JointVentures / StrategicAlliance
6. Lawsuits
7. Earnings
8. LabourUnion

Sources: all articles are scrapped from globenewswire & prnewswire
Direct links to these pages from where these documents were extracted are listed in seed_urls.txt

The documents extracted from each source is seperately placed in different directories.
Each document resides in a a subdirectory with the name of the category to which it belongs.
eg: a document from source 'Sx' under category 'Cx' can be found in ./business_news_dataset/Sx/Cx/Sx_Cx_yy.txt


A csv form of the dataset is also shared as dataset.csv with the following headers:
label - class to which the article belongs
headline - Article headline
situation - Article content
